parameter.name: bit-index
parameter.label: Bit Index
parameter.description: Index of the bit to extract/write from the value. Index=0 refers to the least significant bit.

parameter.name: inverted
parameter.label: Whether to invert the output
parameter.description: Whether to invert the bit value. When inverted=true, set bit value (1) corresponds to 0/OFF/CLOSED and unset bit value (0) corresponds to 1/ON/OPEN.
